content: 本文大致总结了ICDE2023涉及时空相关领域的论文，由于时间有限只是快速浏览与总结，难免遗漏请谅解。 时空数据 When Spatio-Temporal Meet Wavelets: Disentangled Traffic Forecasting via Efficient Spectral Graph Attention Networks Self-Supervised Spatial-Temporal Bottleneck Attentive Network for Efﬁcient Long-term Trafﬁc Forecasting Dynamic Hypergraph Structure Learning for Traffic Flow Forecasting Extreme-Aware Local-Global Attention for Spatio-Temporal Urban Mobility Learning PriSTI: A Conditional Diffusion Framework for Spatiotemporal Imputation ROI-demand Traffic Prediction: A Pre-train, Query and Fine-tune Framework Uncertainty Quantification for Traffic Forecasting: A Unified Approach Discovering Frequency Bursting Patterns in Temporal Graphs TSEXPLAIN: Explaining Aggregated Time Series by Surfacing Evolving Contributors TSC-AutoML: Meta-learning for automatic Time Series Classification Algorithm Selection REncoder: A Space-Time Efficient Range Filter with Local Encoder Mining Seasonal Temporal Patterns in Time Series Towards Long-Term Time-Series Forecasting: Feature, Pattern, and Distribution Forecasting COVID-19 Dynamics: Clustering, Generalized Spatiotemporal Attention, and Impacts of Mobility and Geographic Proximity M2G4RTP: A Multi-Level and Multi-Task Graph Model for Instant-Logistics Route and Time Joint Prediction Delivery Time Prediction Using Large-Scale Graph Structure Learning Based on Quantile Regression BASM: A Bottom-up Adaptive Spatiotemporal Model for Online Food Ordering Service 轨迹数据 Online Anomalous Subtrajectory Detection on Road Networks with Deep Reinforcement Learning BERT-Trip: Effective and Scalable Trip Representation using Attentive Contrast Learning RNTrajRec: Road Network Enhanced Trajectory Recovery with Spatial-Temporal Transformer Self-supervised Trajectory Representation Learning with Temporal Regularities and Travel Semantics A Lightweight Framework for Fast Trajectory Simplification LHMM: A Learning Enhanced HMM Model for Cellular Trajectory Map-matching Contrastive Trajectory Similarity Learning with Dual-Feature Attention Towards Efficient MIT query in Trajectory Data 图与网络 CLDG: Contrastive Learning on Dynamic Graphs SEIGN: A Simple and Efficient Graph Neural Network for Large Dynamic Graphs Unsupervised Graph Outlier Detection: Problem Revisit, New Insight, and Superior Method Revisiting Citation Prediction with Cluster-Aware Text-Enhanced Heterogeneous Graph Neural Networks Disconnected Emerging Knowledge Graph Oriented Inductive Link Prediction GALE: Active Adversarial Learning for Erroneous Node Detection in Graphs AutoAC: Towards Automated Attribute Completion for Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network Inconsistency Detection with Temporal Graph Functional Dependencies Discovering Frequency Bursting Patterns in Temporal Graphs Finer-Grained Engagement in Hypergraphs Efficiently Answering Quality Constrained Shortest Distance Queries in Large Graphs Reinforcement Learning Enhanced Weighted Sampling for Accurate Subgraph Counting on Fully Dynamic Graph Streams Efficiently Sampling and Estimating Hypergraphs By Hybrid Random Walk HGMatch: A Match-by-Hyperedge Framework for Efficient and Parallel Subhypergraph Matching PSPC: Efficient Parallel Shortest Path Counting on Large-Scale Graphs Top-r keyword-based community search in attributed graphs Experimental Evaluation of Indexing Techniques for Shortest Distance Queries on Road Networks Finding Top-k Optimal Routes with Collective Spatial Keywords on Road Networks Reinforcement Learning based Tree Decomposition for Distance Querying in Road Networks Efficient Public Transport Planning on Roads 数据质量 Automatic Feasibility Study via Data Quality Analysis for ML: A Case-Study on Label Noise ENLD: Efficient Noisy Label Detection for Incremental Datasets in Data Lake RADAR: Reactive Concept Drift Management with Robust Variational Inference for Evolving IoT Data Streams Data Imputation for Sparse Radio Maps in Indoor Positioning 其他 Exploring both Individuality and Cooperation for Air-Ground Spatial Crowdsourcing by Multi-Agent Deep Reinforcement Learning Sudowoodo: Contrastive Self-supervised Learning for Multi-purpose Data Integration and Preparation Toward a Unified Framework for Unsupervised Complex Tabular Reasoning Contrastive Enhanced Slide Filter Mixer for Sequential Recommendation Modeling Intra- and Inter-community Information for Route and Time Prediction in Last-mile Delivery Backward-Sort for Time Series in Apache IoTDB Online Learning from Streaming Data: Challenges and Lessons Learned for Real-Time Applications

title: [ICDE2023] 时空数据挖掘方向论文总结

content:
Create slides in Markdown with Wowchemy Wowchemy | Documentation
Features Efficiently write slides in Markdown 3-in-1: Create, Present, and Publish your slides Supports speaker notes Mobile friendly slides Controls Next: Right Arrow or Space Previous: Left Arrow Start: Home Finish: End Overview: Esc Speaker notes: S Fullscreen: F Zoom: Alt + Click PDF Export Code Highlighting Inline code: variable
Code block:
porridge = "blueberry" if porridge == "blueberry": print("Eating...") Math In-line math: $x + y = z$
Block math:
$$ f\left( x \right) = ;\frac{{2\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x - 4} \right)}}{{\left( {x + 4} \right)\left( {x + 1} \right)}} $$
Fragments Make content appear incrementally
{{% fragment %}} One {{% /fragment %}} {{% fragment %}} **Two** {{% /fragment %}} {{% fragment %}} Three {{% /fragment %}} Press Space to play!
One Two Three A fragment can accept two optional parameters:
class: use a custom style (requires definition in custom CSS) weight: sets the order in which a fragment appears Speaker Notes Add speaker notes to your presentation
{{% speaker_note %}} - Only the speaker can read these notes - Press `S` key to view {{% /speaker_note %}} Press the S key to view the speaker notes!
Only the speaker can read these notes Press S key to view Themes black: Black background, white text, blue links (default) white: White background, black text, blue links league: Gray background, white text, blue links beige: Beige background, dark text, brown links sky: Blue background, thin dark text, blue links night: Black background, thick white text, orange links serif: Cappuccino background, gray text, brown links simple: White background, black text, blue links solarized: Cream-colored background, dark green text, blue links Custom Slide Customize the slide style and background
{{< slide background-image="/media/boards.jpg" >}} {{< slide background-color="#0000FF" >}} {{< slide class="my-style" >}} Custom CSS Example Let’s make headers navy colored.
Create assets/css/reveal_custom.css with:
.reveal section h1, .reveal section h2, .reveal section h3 { color: navy; } Questions? Ask
Documentation
